Curve_Points Property

CDXML Name:CurvePoints
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Curve_Points
CDX Constant Value:0x0A23
Data Size:CDXCurvePoints
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Curve
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?Required for curves

Description:

The Bézier curve's control point locations.
